(* 1996-1997 MORGEN + 1994 ERGO SBP prevalence rates
specified by gender,
within gender by class <120<140<160>=180 mmHg & medication,
within class by 5 year ageclass rest class 85+

1994 class transition rates derived from 1994 class prevalence rates
specified by gender,
within gender by class transition,
within calss transition by 5 year age class rest class 85+ *)

#classes 5
